Image.Alt: Image of a scout standing on a trophy base. The text says "Michael Dikant Annual Honor Scout Award Troop 53 Castleton"
Image.Caption: A rendering of the physical award. The Scout that wins the award keeps it for a year before passing it on to the next year's scout.

Image.Alt: Two people standing on the camera. The scout on the right is holding the Michael Dikant Award.
Image.Caption: Dustin Albertine receiving the award in 2004. To his left is Bill Dikant.
